description: Bandit Config Generator - This tool is used to generate an optional profile. The profile may be used to include or skip tests and override values for plugins.

-h.description: show this help message and exit

--show-defaults.description: show the default settings values for each plugin but do not output a profile

-t.description: list of test names to run

-s.description: list of test names to skip

notes: When used to store an output profile, this tool will output a template that includes all plugins and their default settings.
Any settings which aren't being overridden can be safely removed from the profile and default values will be used.
Bandit will prefer settings from the profile over the built in values.
